text: Wakulu wa Wafilisti nawauza, “Wang'honyo wa hetwe wano Waisilaeli wangukola choni hano?” Akishi nakawalonjela wala wakulu wa Wafilisti, “Ayu ndo Daudi, chitumagwa wa Sauli, mndewa wa Waisilaeli, ka hamwe na heni kwa mhela winji. Kulawa loyalawile Isilaeli kuwa hamwe na heni, hambe mbone wihe woneche kwa heye.”
